properties.value: •

<style>
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=Poppins:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap');

:root {

    --primary: #12648b;
    --secondary: #ed1a26;
    --focus:#8DC6E8;
   
}


/*font*/

/*body*/
    body#landing_page {
        background-color: #ffffff !important;
    }
    #landing_page #partners-section.form-section {
        background: #ffffff !important;
        padding: 100px 0 40px !important;
        margin-top: 0 !important;
    }
    
    #landing_page .container {
        padding: 0 40px;
    }
    a.card.card-link.collapsed:after {

    content: '\f107';

    width: 5px;

    height: 5px;

    top: 32%;

    right: 36px;

    position: absolute;

    font-family: 'FontAwesome';

    font-size: 29px;

    color: #13BE6E;

}

@media (min-width: 1400px){
    #landing_page .container {
        max-width: 1620px !important;
    }
}

/*navbar*/
    #logo-img img {
        width: 148px;
    }
    #landing_page .container:has(.navbar) {
        padding: 0px;
         max-width: 100%;
    }
@media (max-width: 767px){
    

    a.menu-block.login-btn.rounded-4.text-decoraiotn-none {
    font-size: 10px !important;
    padding: 16px 14px;
    margin: 0 2px;
    }
    
    #landing_page .navbar #btn-menu-login input.form-control.border-0.bg-light::placeholder {
        font-size: 10px;
        padding: 0px 10px !important;

    }
    
    #landing_page .navbar #btn-menu-login i.fa.fa-search {
        font-size: 12px !important;
    }
    
    #landing_page .navbar #btn-menu-login .p-1.bg-light .input-group {
        height: 18px;
    }
    
    #landing_page .navbar #btn-menu-login input.form-control.border-0.bg-light {
        height: 38px;
    }
    
    #landing_page .navbar #btn-menu-login .input-group-append {
        margin-left: -35px !important;
    }
}
/*about section*/

#about img.img-fluid.rounded-circle {
    width: auto !important;
    height: 54px !important;
}

#about .features-icon {
    width: 84px;
    height: 84px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border-radius: 26px;
}

#about .col-lg-4:first-child .features-icon {
    background: #F2DB6A33;
}
#about .col-lg-4:nth-child(2) .features-icon {
    background: #F9A6B233;
}
#about .col-lg-4:nth-child(3) .features-icon {
    background: #E9FFEF;
}

#about h3.title {
    color: #363848 !important;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 48px;
    line-height: 72px;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    margin-bottom: 25px;
}


#about h3.title span {
    color: #A85FFF;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 48px;
    line-height: 72px;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
}


#about p.text {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 24px;
    line-height: 33px;
    color: #363848 !important;
}

#about .features-icon {
    text-align: center;
}

#about h4.features-title {
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 36px;
    line-height: 54px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #363848;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    margin: 40px 0;
}


#about .row.justify-content-center {
    margin-bottom: 80px;
}

#about .single-features .features-content p.text {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #909091 !important;
}


#about .about-title p {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 18px !important;
    line-height: 26px;
    text-align: left;
    color: #909091 !important;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
}



#about .accordion button {
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 24px !important;
    line-height: 32px;
    color: #363848;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    margin-left: 30px;
}

#about .card-header span {
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 36px !important;
    line-height: 54px;
    background: rgb(242 219 106 / 20%);
    width: 84px !important;
    height: 84px !important;
    border-radius: 26px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}

#about .card-header#headingOne span {

    color: #F2DB6A;
    background: rgb(242 219 106 / 20%);
    
}

#about #headingTwo span {

    color: #A85FFF;
    background: #A85FFF33;
    
}

#about #headingThree span {

    color: #3DCD65;
    background: rgb(61 205 101 / 20%);
    
}


#about .card-header {
    height: 120px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    box-shadow: 0px 7px 22px rgba(143, 134, 196, 0.07);
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: none !important;
}

#about .card {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border: none;
}

#about .accordion .card-header:has(+.show) {
    box-shadow: none !important;
    
}


#about .card .card-body p.text {
    color: #909090 !important;
    font-family: 'Open Sans';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 26px;
    margin-left: 107px;
}
#about .about-image.mt-50 {
    text-align: right;
}

.about-bloc1:after {
    content: url('/jw/web/app/hirevioo/resources/sep-about.png');
    height: 39px;
    position: absolute;
    right: calc(50% - 38px);
    background: url('/jw/web/app/hirevioo/resources/sep-about.png');
}


#about .about-image.mt-50 img {
    width: -webkit-fill-available;
}

#about .col-lg-6.explore-btn {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 50px;
}

#about .col-lg-6.explore-btn a.menu-block.login-btn {
    padding: 22px 60px !important;
}

#about .card-header div.card-title {
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 24px !important;
    line-height: 32px;
    color: #363848;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    margin-left: 30px;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    text-transform: capitalize;
}


#about .card:first-child .card-header span {
    color: #F2DB6A;
    background: rgb(242 219 106 / 20%);
}

#about .card:nth-child(2) .card-header span {
    color: #A85FFF;
    background: #A85FFF33;
}

#about .card:nth-child(3) .card-header span{
    color: #3DCD65;
    background: rgb(61 205 101 / 20%);
}

#about .card-body {
    color: #909090 !important;
    font-family: 'Open Sans';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400 !important;
    font-size: 18px !important;
    line-height: 26px;
    margin-left: 107px;
}

/*profile slider section*/

#profile-slider button.btn.btn-success {
    width: inherit;
    color: white;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
    background: #13be6e;
    border-color: #13be6e;
}

#profile-slider li span {
    padding-left: 12px;
    color: #000000;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    line-height: 22px;
}

#profile-slider .card h4.mb-0.me-2 {
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 30px;
    color: #363848;
}

#profile-slider .card p {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 15px;
    line-height: 20px;
    color: #000000;
}
#profile-slider .slider-logo {
    background:#ffffff !important;
}
#profile-slider .wrapper {
    background: white;
}

#profile-slider button.slick-next.slick-arrow {
    background: #13BE6E;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border-radius: 50px;
    right: 0;
}


#profile-slider button.slick-next.slick-arrow:hover, #profile-slider button.slick-next.slick-arrow:focus {
    background: #13be6e !important;
    border: none;
    color: transparent !important;
}

#profile-slider button.slick-prev.slick-arrow {
    background: #13BE6E;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border-radius: 50px;
    left: 0;
}

#profile-slider button.slick-prev.slick-arrow:hover, #profile-slider button.slick-prev.slick-arrow:focus {
    background: #13be6e !important;
    border: none;
    color: transparent !important;
}


#profile-slider .slick-slide .card-body {
    padding: 40px !important;
}

#profile-slider .slick-slide .d-flex.align-items-center.mb-4 {
    margin-bottom: 42px !important;
}

#profile-slider .wrapper {
    padding-top: 40px;
}

#profile-slider .wrapper {
    padding-top: 40px;
}

#profile-slider .form-cell-value>.d-flex.align-items-center {
    padding: 0 50px;
}


#profile-slider .form-cell-value>.d-flex.align-items-center button.btn-link-more {
    padding: 0 20px;
    color: #13BE6E;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 27px;
}

#profile-slider .form-cell-value>.d-flex.align-items-center h3.title {
    padding: 0 20px;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 32px;
    line-height: 48px;
    color: #363848 !important;
}

#profile-slider .card .flex-shrink-0 {
    position: relative;
    }
  
#profile-slider .card .check {
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0px;
    background: #30C736;
    border-radius: 50px;
    width: 22px;
    height: 22px;
    border: 3px solid #F0D655;
}

#profile-slider .card ul.mb-0.list-unstyled.d-flex.flex-row li {
    color: #D8D8D8;
}

#profile-slider .card ul.mb-0.list-unstyled.d-flex.flex-row li.fav-active {
    color: #FF8412;
}

@media (max-width: 1440px){
    #profile-slider .slick-slide .card-body {
        padding: 15px !important;
    }
}

/*partners*/
  
#partners .section-title span {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 20px !important;
    line-height: 27px;
    color: #A85FFF;
}

#partners .section-title h4.title {
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 40px !important;
    line-height: 60px;
}

#partners .section-title p.text {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 24px !important;
    line-height: 33px;
   
}

#partners button.slick-prev {
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border-radius: 50px;
    background: #50457B;
    box-shadow: 0px 19px 29px rgba(62, 53, 120, 0.14);
  
}

#partners button.slick-prev:hover, #partners button.slick-prev:focus {
    background: rgba(54, 56, 72, 0.2) !important;
    border: none;
    color: transparent !important;
}

#partners button.slick-next {
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
    border-radius: 50px;
    background: #50457B;
    box-shadow: 0px 19px 29px rgb(62 53 120 / 14%);
}

#partners button.slick-next:hover, #partners button.slick-next:focus {
    background: rgba(54, 56, 72, 0.2) !important;
    border: none;
    color: transparent !important;
}

#partners {
        background: #F8F9FD !important;
}

#partners .slider-logo.wrapper {
        background: #F8F9FD;
}


#partners .slick-slide div {
    text-align: center;
}

#partners .slick-slider img {
    height: 42px;
    width: auto !important;
    /*opacity: 0.2;*/
}

#landing_page #contact {
    margin-top: 0 !important;
}

/*contact*/
#contact {
    background-color: #A85FFF;
}

#contact .section-title h4.title {
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 40px !important;
    line-height: 60px;
    color: #ffffff;
}

#contact .section-title p.text {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 24px !important;
    line-height: 33px;
    color: #ffffff;
   
}

#contact input {
    background: transparent !important;
    border: none !important;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #FFFFFF !important;
    height: 62px !important;
    margin-bottom: 40px !important;
}

#contact textarea.form-control {
    border: 2px solid #FFFFFF;
    border-radius: 60px;
    background: transparent;
    padding: 50px 70px;
    height: auto !important;
}


#contact form.php-email-form {
    width: 94%;
}

#contact input::placeholder, #contact textarea::placeholder  {
        color: rgb(255 255 255 / 50%) !important;
        font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: 400;
        font-size: 24px !important;
        line-height: 33px;
}

#contact .row.justify-content-center {
    margin-top: 90px;
    margin-bottom: 70px;
}

#contact .row.justify-content-center {
    margin-bottom: 70px;
    margin-top: 90px;
}

#contact .text-right {
    margin-top: 40px;
    margin-bottom: 60px;
}

#contact button.waves-effect.btn.waves-button.waves-float {
    background: #FFFFFF;
    border-radius: 56px;
    padding: 22px 60px;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 20px !important;
    line-height: 30px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #363848 !important;
}
.submit-btn-contact{

   background: #FFFFFF;
    border-radius: 56px;
    padding: 22px 60px;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 20px !important;
    line-height: 30px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #363848 !important;
}

/*footer*/
#landing_page #footer-landing {
    background: #1F2131 !important;
    margin-top: 0px !important;
    padding: 30px 40px 30px;
}

#footer-landing .col-12:first-child {
   
    text-align: left;
}

#footer-landing p.text-muted.m-0 {
    max-width: 427px;
    font-family: 'Open Sans';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    line-height: 24px;
    color: #ffffff !important;
    margin-top: 20px;
    
}

#footer-landing a p.m-0.pb-2, #footer-landing a p.m-0.pt-1, #footer-landing p.text-muted {
    font-family: 'Poppins';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400 !important;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    line-height: 24px;
    color: #ffffff !important;
    padding-bottom: 20px !important;
    text-align: left;
}



#footer-landing h5.pb-2 {
    font-family: 'Poppins';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 20px !important;
    line-height: 30px;
    color: #ffffff;
    text-align: left;
}

#landing_page #sub-footer-landing {
   margin-top: 0 !important;
    padding: 5px 40px 15px;
    background: #1f2131 !important;
    border-top: 1px solid #3D3F4E !important;
}

#landing_page footer p.text-center, #landing_page footer p.text-center a {
    font-family: 'Poppins';
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 500 !important;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    line-height: 24px;
    color: #ffffff !important;
}

#footer-landing .contact-details .col-12.col-md-6 .d-flex.justify-content-center.justify-content-md-start span.mdi {
    color: #72737C;
    margin-right: 40px;
    
}

#footer-landing .contact-details .col-12.col-md-6 .d-flex.justify-content-center.justify-content-md-start span.mdi i {
    font-size: 18px !important;
}

#footer-landing .contact-details .col-12.col-md-6 .d-flex.justify-content-center.justify-content-md-start {
    margin-top: 60px;
}

#footer-landing i.fa.fa-map-marker {
    font-size: 18px !important;
    margin-right: 15px;
}

#footer-landing i.fa.fa-phone {
    font-size: 18px !important;
    margin-right: 15px;
}

#footer-landing i.fa.fa-envelope {
    font-size: 18px !important;
    margin-right: 15px;
}

/*modif footer*/

body #form-canvas #footer-hirevioo.form-section {
    background-color: #1f2131 !important;
    color: white !important;
    padding: 0;
    margin-top: 0px !important;
}

/*hidden profile block */

#profile-slider {
    display: none;
}

section#about .card-link+.card-link{
    margin-left:0px;
}

/*responsive*/

@media (min-width: 768px)  {
    #landing_page .navbar {
        height: 87px !important;
    }
    #landing_page #slider {
        margin-top: 70px !important;
    }

    #landing_page .slider-area .hero__caption h1, #landing_page .slider-area .hero__caption h1 span {
        font-size: 42px !important;
    }

    #slider-details {
        font-size: 18px;
    }

    form.search-box .search-form a {
        font-size: 18px !important;
    }

    #about h3.title {
        font-size: 42px;
    }

    #about p.text {
        font-size: 18px;
    }

    #about h4.features-title {
        font-size: 28px;
        line-height: 38px;  
    }

    #about .single-features .features-content p.text {
        
        font-size: 16px;
        line-height: 22px;
        
    }

    #about h3.title {
        font-size: 36px;   
    }

    #about .about-title p {
        font-size: 16px !important;  
    }

    #profile-slider button.btn.btn-success {
        font-size: 14px;
    }

    #profile-slider li span {
        font-size: 12px !important;
        
    }

    #profile-slider .card h4.mb-0.me-2 {
        font-size: 16px; 
    }

    #profile-slider .card p {
        font-size: 13px;  
    }

    #landing_page #partners {
        margin-top: 30px !important;
    }
    #partners .section-title h4.title {
        font-size: 34px !important;
    }

    #partners .section-title p.text {
        font-size: 18px !important; 
    }

    #contact .section-title h4.title {
        font-size: 34px !important;   
    }

    #contact .section-title p.text {
        font-size: 18px !important;
    }
    #contact input::placeholder, #contact textarea.form-control::placeholder {
        font-size: 18px !important;
    }

    #contact button.waves-effect.btn.waves-button.waves-float {
        font-size: 18px !important;
    }
    #contact .row.justify-content-center {
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    margin-top: 45px;
    }
    #about h3.title span {
    font-size: 36px;
    }
    
}

#landing_page .header {
    background: #f8f9fd;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 1279px){
    .menu-inner {

        column-gap: 25px;
        width: 70%;

    }

}

@media only screen and (max-width: 992px){
    #about .col-lg-6.explore-btn a.menu-block.login-btn {

        margin-top: 20px;
        font-size: 14px !important;
    }
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 939px){
    .menu {

        width: 38%;
    }

    a.menu-link {
    font-size: 14px !important;
    }

    a.login-btn {

    font-size: 14px !important;
    
    }
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 859px){



    .slider-area img {
        display: none;
    }

    a.tag.menu-block.login-btn.rounded-4.text-decoraiotn-none {
    padding: 16px 10px !important;
    }
    
    .menu-inner {
        column-gap: 15px;
    }

    
    .slider-area .hero__caption h1 {
    font-size: 30px !important;
    }

    #slider-details {
    font-size: 18px;
    }





    
}


@media only screen and (max-width: 48rem){
    .navbar {
        height: 87px;
       
    }

    a.tag.menu-block.login-btn {
        margin-right: 10px;
    }

    #landing_page div#slider {
        margin-top:0px !important;
    }

    form.search-box .search-form a {
    font-size: 14px !important;
    padding: 18px 30px;
  
    }
    .single-slider .container {
    height: 66vh;
    }

    #landing_page #partners-section.form-section {
    padding: 30px 0 0px !important;
    }

    #about h3.title {
    font-size: 22px;
    line-height: 32px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    }

    #about .about-title p {
   
    font-size: 12px !important;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    #about .card-header a.card-link {
  
    font-size: 18px !important;
    line-height: 26px;
    margin-left: 15px;
    }

    #about .card-header span {
   font-size: 22px !important;
   line-height: 35px;
   background: rgb(242 219 106 / 20%);
   width: 58px !important;
   height: 58px !important;
   border-radius: 26px;
   }

   #about .card-header {
    height: 80px;
}
#about .card-body {
    font-size: 12px !important;
    line-height: 22px;
    margin-left: 0px;
}

   
#landing_page #partners {
    margin-top: 30px !important;
}
   

   #partners .section-title span {
    
    font-size: 14px !important;
    line-height: 22px;
    
   }

   #partners .section-title h4.title {

    font-size: 22px !important;
    line-height: 32px;
